lines.text: I'll kill you Alligator Man! Just like I'd kill any four-legged gator!
What secret was Mrs. Hawthorne hiding in this strange, unfriendly house?
Why had she told me not to leave my room?
Miz Hawthorne, she deal with the Evil One.
I'll never be able to tell you how sorry I am.
Don't blame yourself, I certainly don't. Who can know everything? You're not God, Mark.
I feel as if I've been playing at it... and been punished.
